56.eng-name: The Book of Commentary on the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Jabir reported that 'Abdullah b. Ubayy b. Salul used to say to his slave-girl:Go and fetch something for us by committing prostitution. It was in this connection that Allah, the Exalted and Glorious, revealed this verse:" And compel not your slave-girls to prostitution when they desire to keep chaste in order to seek the frail goods of this world's life, and whoever compels them, then surely after their compulsion Allah is Forgiving, Merciful" (xxiv)

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى {وَلاَ تُكْرِهُوا فَتَيَاتِكُمْ عَلَى الْبِغَاءِ}
chapter.eng-name: Allah's Saying: "And Force Not Your Maids To Prostitution"
